text: Ferruccio Pisoni (6 August 1936 â€“ 12 December 2020) was an Italian politician. He was a Deputy from 1968 to 1983. Pisoni was born in Trevi, Italy. He was a member of the Christian Democracy. Pisoni died on 12 December 2020 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Umbria
title: Ferruccio Pisoni
